# Member

Represents a server member.

Properties Functions
user .addRole(roleID, Reason)
nick .removeRole(roleID, reason)
roles .avatarURL(size, format)
deaf .guild()
mute .kick(reason)
joinedAt .edit(options)
premiumSince .hasPermissions(permissions)
tag
mention
guildID

# Properties:

  • # user

User object of the member.

Type: user

  • # nick

The nickname of the user in the guild

Type: string?

  • # roles

The user's role ids

Type: Array<String>

  • # deaf

Whether this user is deafened by the server

Type: boolean

  • # mute

Whether this user is locally deafened

Type: boolean

  • # joinedAt

When the user joined the guild

Type: number

  • # premiumSince

When the user used their nitro boost on the server.

Type: number

  • # tag

The full username#discriminator.

Type: string

  • # mention

The user mention with nickname if possible.

Type: string

  • # guildID

The guild id where this member exists.

Type: string

# Functions:

  • # addRole

Add a role to the guild member

Parameter Type Description
roleID string The ID of the role.
reason string (Optional) The reason to be displayed in the Guild Audit Log.

Returns: promise

  • # removeRole

Remove a role from the guild member

Parameter Type Description
roleID string The ID of the role.
reason string (Optional) The reason to be displayed in the Guild Audit Log.

Returns: promise

  • # avatarURL

The users custom avatar or the default avatar

Parameter Type Description
size ImageURLOptions The size of the Avatar (any power bof two between 16 and 4096)
format string The filetype of the avatar

Returns: promise

  • # guild

Gets the guild object from cache for this member. This is a method instead of a prop to preserve memory (WIP)

Parameter Type Description

Returns: promise

  • # kick

Kick a member from the server

Parameter Type Description
reason string (Optional) The reason to be displayed in the Guild Audit Log.

Returns: promise

  • # edit

Edit the member

Parameter Type Description
options object The properties to edit
options.nick string (Optional) Value to set users nickname to. Requires MANAGE_NICKNAMES permission
options.roles Array<String> (Optional) Array of role ids the member is assigned. Requires MANAGE_ROLES permission
options.mute boolean (Optional) Whether the user is muted in voice channels. Requires MUTE_MEMBERS permission
options.deaf boolean (Optional) Whether the user is deafened in voice channels. Requires DEAFEN_MEMBERS permission
options.channel_id string (Optional) The id of the channel to move user to if they are connected to voice. To kick the user from their current channel, set to null. Requires MOVE_MEMBERS permission. When moving members to channels, must have permissions to both CONNECT to the channel and have the MOVE_MEMBER permission.

Returns: promise

  • # hasPermissions

Checks if the member has this permission. If the member is an owner or has admin perms it will always be true (WIP)

Parameter Type Description

Returns: promise

Improve on Github!
